subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins had their fortunes take another dive when running back Tim Hightower was declared out for the season with a torn knee ligament and receiver Santana Moss had hand surgery.
snippet: The Washington Redskins had their fortunes take another dive when running back Tim Hightower was declared out for the season with a torn knee ligament and receiver Santana Moss had hand surgery.
